question.prompt: What is the principal (chief) question or concern you have regarding your current condition?
In your own words, please provide a brief narrative of the details of the problem for which you are requesting a second opinion:
When were you first diagnosed?
What type of doctor diagnosed your condition?
If other, please indicate:
When were you last examined by your physician?
Have you had any of the following studies?
If you have had any of the following studies, please complete the following information:
Have you had any injuries or traumas related to your condition?
If you have had any injuries or traumas related to your condition, how did the injury occur?
If other, please indicate:
Please describe the nature of the injury (fracture, nerve damage, etc.):
Do you have or have a Worker's Compensation claim involving this problem?
Have your ever been treated with a regional anesthesia block for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with a regional anesthesia block for your condition, please indicate below which of the following anesthesia blocks you have had. Be sure to provide the additional information about each type of treatment.
If Stellate ganglion block, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the block helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If Lumbar sympathetic block, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the block helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If Brachial plexus block, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the block helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If Bier block, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the block helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If other, please list:
If Other anesthesia block, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the block helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
Have you ever been treated with a neurostimulator for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with a neurostimulator for your condition, please indicate below which of the following neurostimulators you have used. Be sure to provide the additional information about each type of treatment.
If spinal, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the neurostimulator helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If laminectomy, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the neurostimulator helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If peripheral nerve, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the neurostimulator helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If needle, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the neurostimulator helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If other, please list:
If other neurostimulator, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the neurostimulator helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
Have you ever been treated with physical therapy for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with physical therapy for your condition, please indicate below which physical therapy treatments you have used. Be sure to provide the additional information about each type of treatment.
If BAPS, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If exercise, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If heat application, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If cold application, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If vibration, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If desensitization, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
If other, please list:
If other physical therapy treatment, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If the treatment helped, how long did the relief last? (hours, days, etc.)
Have you ever been treated with anti-inflammatory medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with anti-inflammatory medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following anti-inflammatory medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If ibuprofen, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If naproxen, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If celebrex, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If vioxx, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If relafen, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If lodine, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If indocin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If aspirin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If other, please list:
If other anti-inflammatory medication, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you ever been treated with muscle relaxant medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with muscle relaxant medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following muscle relaxant medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If Flexeril, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Robaxin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Skelaxin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Valium, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If other, please list:
If other, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you ever been treated with pain reliever medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with pain reliever medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following pain reliever medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If Acetaminophen, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Ultram, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Darvon/Darvocet, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Codeine, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Hydrocodone (Vicodin, Lortab), please indicate your response to the treatment:
If other, please list:
If other, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you ever been treated with steroid medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with steroid medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following steroid medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If Prednisone, Medrol, please indicate your response to the treatment:
please list the steroids
If other steroid medication, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you ever been treated with anti-seizure medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with anti-seizure medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following anti-seizure medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If Neurontin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Dilantin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Valproic acid, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If other, please list:
If other, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you ever been treated with anti-depressant medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with anti-depressant medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following anti-depressant medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If Elavil, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Trazadone, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Doxepin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Effexor, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Zoloft, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Paxil, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Prozac, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If other, please list:
If other, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you ever been treated with anti-hypertensive medications for your condition?

If you have ever been treated with anti-hypertensive medications for your condition, please indicate below which of the following anti-hypertensive medications you have used. Please be sure to provide the additional information about each medication that you have used.
If Prazosin, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If Nifedipine, please indicate your response to the treatment:
If other, please list:
If other, please indicate your response to the treatment:
Have you undergone surgery / surgical procedure(s) for your current condition (one you are seeking opinion for)?
If you have undergone surgery / surgical procedure(s) for your current condition, please complete the following information:
If you have undergone surgical treatment, what is your general subjective impression of the experience? (In your own words)
Since the surgery, have you had any residual (leftover) pain?
Have you undergone experimental therapy for your current condition (one you are seeking opinion for)?
If you have undergone experimental therapy for your current condition, please complete the following information:
If you have undergone experimental or alternative treatment, what is your general subjective impression of the experience? (In your own words)
Regarding the experimental or alternative treatment, how would you rate your overall satisfaction with the treatment? (1 = not at all satisfied, 10 = very satisfied)
Have you undergone acupuncture therapy for your current condition (one you are seeking opinion for)?
If you undergone acupuncture therapy for your current condition, what is your general subjective impression of the experience? (In your own words)
Regarding the acupuncture treatment, how would you rate your overall satisfaction with the treatment? (1 = not at all satisfied, 10 = very satisfied)
In your own words, please describe how your condition began. Please be specific. (For example, 'I fell and hurt my arm and the pain started two weeks later')
Are you experiencing pain?
If you are experiencing pain, what is the location of your pain (arm, leg, side of face, etc.)?
If you are experiencing pain, which of the following best describe your pain? (choose all that apply)
If other, please describe:
Is your pain?
Please rate your pain on the scale below: (1 = minimal pain, 10 = worst pain)
Do you have any swelling in the affected area?
If you have any swelling in the affected area, where is the swelling located?
Is the swelling?
What is the color of the skin in the region of the painful condition? (choose all that apply)
If other, please indicate:
Have you had any change in the texture or character of the skin in the region of the painful condition?
If you had any change in the texture or character of the skin in the region of the painful condition, please describe the change in your skin texture: (shiny, coarse, rippled, etc.)
Which of the following best describes the usual temperature of your skin in the region of the painful condition?

selection.text: Colder than the rest of my body
Warmer than the rest of my body
Temperature changes from warm to cold intermittently

question.prompt: What best describes your nail growth in the region of the painful condition?
What best describes your hair growth in the region of the painful condition?
Have you experienced any problem with the mobility (movement) of the affected area?
If you have experienced any problem with the mobility of the affected area, please describe (unable to bend or straighten arm or leg; facial paralysis, etc.):
Do you experience any tremors (shakes)?
If you experience any tremors , where are the tremors located?
Do the tremors get worse with movement?
Please indicate below if your condition has affected your ability to do any of the following: (choose all that apply)
Indicate level of impairment:
Indicate level of impairment:
Indicate level of impairment:
Indicate level of impairment:
Indicate level of impairment:
Indicate level of impairment:
Do you currently use an assistive device?
If you currently use an assistive device, please indicate below: (choose all that apply)
If other, please indicate:
What has been recommended regarding your current treatment? (sympathectomy, regional anesthesia, etc).
Which doctor made this recommendation?
Is there anything else you think would be helpful regarding your condition?
